title: CLARIN Newsflash January 2026 is Out
content: CLARIN Newsflash January 2026 is Out Every month the Newsflash gives an overview of what has been happening at the CLARIN, the national consortia and the wider community. The newsflash also features events, calls and vacancies that are relevant for the CLARIN community. Read the most recent Newsflash: January 2026 Subscribing to it is the ideal way of staying informed. creator: Elisa Gorgaini
